newsitem.title: USA: TJX expects Q3 EPS increase before charge.
newsitem.headline: TJX expects Q3 EPS increase before charge.

text.p: TJX Cox Inc said Thursday said it expects to report third quarter earnings in the range of $0.85 to $0.90 per share before a one-time extraordinary charge of $0.03 per share for the retirement of its $89 million 9-1/2 percent sinking fund debentures, which was completed in September.
In the prior year's third quarter, the company reported earnings of $0.44 per share.

TJX, an off-price apparel retailer, said the anticipated increase in earnings is related to stronger-than-expected September same-store sales at T.J. Maxx, Marshalls, Chadwick's, Winners and T.J. Maxx stores.
